snippet: A state panel has effectively killed a bid to name a Lake Tahoe cove for Mark Twain, citing opposition from a tribe that says he held racist views on Native Americans....

headline.print_headline: Racism Claim Dooms Bid to Honor Mark Twain in NV
headline.main: Racism Claim Dooms Bid to Honor Mark Twain in NV

lead_paragraph: A state panel has effectively killed a bid to name a Lake Tahoe cove for Mark Twain, citing opposition from a tribe that says he held racist views on Native Americans.
